name: Axon Hero
description:
Unleash Your Logic And Creativity In This Mind-Bending Machine-Building Adventure.

Axon Hero is more than just a puzzle game - it's a creative playground where logic meets imagination. Build, code, and conquer your way through many hand-crafted challenges, each one more mind-bending than the last.

Build Your Factory Masterpiece


  • Design your own intricate factories filled with conveyor belts, splitters, color converters, and more.
  • Experiment with different machine layouts to find the perfect solution to each unique puzzle.
  • Watch your creation come to life as boxes navigate your circuit, guided by your logic code.

Choose From A Wide Range Of Machines


  • Discover a diverse collection of wacky machines, each with its own special function.
  • Master the art of manipulating boxes, changing their colors, and directing their path.
  • Combine machines in ingenious ways to overcome increasingly challenging puzzles.

Code Your Own Logic


  • Unleash your inner programmer and code your own custom logic circuits.
  • Use logic gates like AND, OR, and NOT to control your machines and solve puzzles in unique ways.
  • No coding experience required - just drag, drop, and connect to bring your genius to life!

Build, Code, Conquer - Axon Hero awaits!
